data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Tarn Taran, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tarn Taran, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Tarn Taran, Punjab, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, encourage the church of Tarn Taran, Punjab, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the county of Tarn Taran a passion to plant another simple church.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Rajput Atiras people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, teach the children in the county of Tarn Taran to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Tarn Taran to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Tarn Taran, Punjab, India has a population of 1,119,600.

We estimate Tarn Taran has 12,316 people who might know Jesus, 13,584 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,093,700 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Tarn Taran to exponentially multiply disciples.
